name: Neuron Fuel, Inc.
description: Provider of a creative computer programming platform designed to teach children the art of coding. The company's creative computer programming platform teaches skills like developing animations, mobile games, creating music, crafting e-books and building fictional robots, enabling children to build application and games, mod Minecraft, control robots, and even learn JavaScript and Python at the age of 7.
one_liner: Provider of a creative computer programming platform designed to teach children the art of coding. The company's creative computer programming platform teaches skills like developing animations, mobile games, creating music, crafting e-books and building fictional robots, enabling children to build application and games, mod Minecraft, control robots, and even learn JavaScript and Python at the age of 7.
